headline: Jan. 6 Prisoner Jake Lang’s Birthday is April 7th – Please Send Jake a Birthday Card and Let Him Know He Is Not Forgotten

sentences:

Top left, Philip Anderson, right, Rosanne Boyland, bottom, Jake Lang
